attributes.action: Add a law protecting young drivers from appalling insurance premiums.
attributes.additional_details: There needs to be something done about the highway robbery that is insurance premiums for people who want to start driving.
attributes.background: My name is Robert, I’m an 18 year old working 40 hours a week currently using public transport for everything. As it stands there is nothing to protect young drivers from being extortioned by insurance companies simply because of their age. I get of nearly £3000 for cars barely worth half that.
